metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36158 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the xrdp package (in branches through 3.14) for Alpine Linux, RDP sessions are vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks because pre-generated RSA certificates and private keys are used.

criterions.comment: xrdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
